doc.title: Magical Twilight 3
doc.plot: While Chipple and Irene's rivalry over Tsukasa continues at the spa, the fractious relationship of the landlady and her daughter plays a further factor in the fight. Unfortunately, their involvement creates a misunderstanding that angers Chipple into attempting an ill advised magic ritual. Irene and Tsukasa try to interfere and the ritual goes wrong with Tsukasa having all his memories of his love for Chipple erased. Now, Chipple must find a way to repair the damage and rekindle the romantic fires that she inadvertently snuffed out.
